description: List service type unit of measure cohorts with filtering and pagination.
permissions: User must be able to view customers in scope; cohorts are limited to customers visible via the customer policy scope.
validation_notes: Filter --service-type-unit-of-measure-id values are coerced to integers by the API.

flags.name: --customer
flags.description: Filter by customer ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --service-type-unit-of-measure-id
flags.description: Filter by service type unit of measure ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Values are coerced to integers by the API.
